propositions.text: 《永夜》全集
卷一
第一章
这段文字出自《永夜》全集，它描绘了一个充满未知与神秘的世界。
作者通过细腻的笔触，勾勒出宏大的世界观和引人入胜的情节。
第二章
在这一章中，主人公踏上了寻找失落的知识的旅程。
沿途的风景，无论是诡异的森林还是古老的遗迹，都充满了奇幻色彩。
第三章
主人公遇到了形形色色的人物，他们有的给予帮助，有的则带来阻碍。
这段经历塑造了主人公的性格，也为后续的故事埋下了伏笔。
卷二
第一章
时间的齿轮继续转动，故事进入了新的篇章。
新的危机悄然而至，主人公必须面对更严峻的挑战。
第二章
情感的纠葛在这一章中变得更加复杂。
爱情、友情、亲情交织在一起，考验着主人公的决心。
卷三
第一章
高潮的到来，所有线索都将汇集。
主人公将在此刻做出决定性的选择，影响着整个世界的命运。
“这世间，永恒的黑暗亦是光明。”
“时间是一把双刃剑，它能治愈一切，也能摧毁一切。”

concepts.name: 《永夜》全集
concepts.context: The main title of the document and its content.

concepts.name: 卷
concepts.context: Major divisions within the collection, e.g., 卷一, 卷二, 卷三.

concepts.name: 章
concepts.context: Subdivisions within each卷, e.g., 第一章, 第二章, 第三章.

concepts.name: 作者
concepts.context: Refers to the creator of the work 《永夜》.

concepts.name: 世界观
concepts.context: The author's portrayal of the fictional universe.

concepts.name: 情节
concepts.context: The narrative events and storyline of the work.

concepts.name: 主人公
concepts.context: The central character of the story.

concepts.name: 知识
concepts.context: Something the protagonist is searching for.

concepts.name: 旅程
concepts.context: The protagonist's quest.

concepts.name: 风景
concepts.context: The settings and environments encountered.

concepts.name: 森林
concepts.context: A type of landscape.

concepts.name: 遗迹
concepts.context: Ancient remnants within the story's setting.

concepts.name: 人物
concepts.context: Other characters encountered by the protagonist.

concepts.name: 帮助
concepts.context: Assistance provided by characters.

concepts.name: 阻碍
concepts.context: Obstacles or hindrances.

concepts.name: 经历
concepts.context: Events that shape the protagonist.

concepts.name: 性格
concepts.context: The protagonist's personality traits.

concepts.name: 伏笔
concepts.context: Foreshadowing for future events.

concepts.name: 时间
concepts.context: A concept related to the progression of events and a philosophical quote.

concepts.name: 危机
concepts.context: A critical or dangerous situation.

concepts.name: 挑战
concepts.context: Difficulties the protagonist must overcome.

concepts.name: 情感
concepts.context: The emotional aspects of the story.

concepts.name: 爱情
concepts.context: A type of emotion or relationship.

concepts.name: 友情
concepts.context: A type of emotion or relationship.

concepts.name: 亲情
concepts.context: A type of emotion or relationship.

concepts.name: 决心
concepts.context: The protagonist's resolve.

concepts.name: 高潮
concepts.context: The peak of the story's tension.

concepts.name: 线索
concepts.context: Elements that connect different parts of the plot.

concepts.name: 选择
concepts.context: Decisions made by the protagonist.

concepts.name: 命运
concepts.context: The predetermined course of events.

concepts.name: 黑暗
concepts.context: A metaphorical or literal state mentioned in a quote.

concepts.name: 光明
concepts.context: A metaphorical or literal state mentioned in a quote.

concepts.name: 治愈
concepts.context: A property of time, as per a quote.

concepts.name: 摧毁
concepts.context: A property of time, as per a quote.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a collection titled '《永夜》全集', divided into '卷' (volumes), which are further subdivided into '章' (chapters). There is also an '附录' (appendix) and philosophical quotes interspersed.
